title: Best of The Program | 7/7/21
description:
Jeffy joins to discuss the Biden administration's intention to go door-to-door to convince people to get vaccinated, and Andrew Cuomo’s daughter coming out as a "demisexual." Defense company Raytheon is more focused on woke staff training than the country's defense. Stu and Pat talk about how soldiers in Afghanistan are leaving in the middle of the night. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
